function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of Bluetooth for tracking COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Potential invasion of user privacy through contact tracing","Mitigation":"Obtain user consent before tracking, anonymize data","Technologies":"Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology","People":"Smartphone users","Owner":"Developers, authorities"},{"Description":"Use of GPS for monitoring COVID-19 positive patients","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential surveillance of individuals","Mitigation":"Sensitive data protection, strict access controls","Technologies":"Global Positioning System (GPS)","People":"COVID-19 positive patients","Owner":"Government authorities"}]}
